places_with_reviews.name: charish 3-line Resto Bar
address: Charish 3 Line - Resto Bar, near Kadambotsav Ground, Banavasi, Karnataka 581318, India

reviews.text:
Highly Recommended.
We had a very pleasant stay here I would say best cottages around Banavasi. Service is very good rooms are very well maintained and clean. 24 hours hot water available, ample of parking space available. Staffs were very humble and caring, helped us in getting all the facilities we asked.

It’s just awesome.👌.
If you r planning for perfect leisure time with your family n friends then this is the place.. 🍾
location, ambiance, food,  are v good.. Owner and faculty are v friendly..
loved it..😍
Lovely hotel in an excellent location. Rooms are spotless & cleaned daily, food was tasty Staff are very helpful , it is the best place for leisure and for party
The stay was extremely good.the staff is very helpful and the food is just too good I have had best dalkhichdi of my life at this place its a must try.

Awesome place to stay in the area.
Awesome morning views.
Chill Owner is there to take care of everything.
Recommended !!

places_with_reviews.name: Shree Channabasaveshwar Khanavali (Roti/Chapati Meals available)
address: Kalyan Mantap, Main Rd, Banavasi, Karnataka 581318, India

reviews.text:
Food was good, felt a bit costly compared to Bangalore. Service was good. Got food on Sunday night too.
Pure North Karnataka food.
Nice North Karnataka Food Available, Chats also good in evening.
Excellent food, clean and simple for the kind of  place it is
